ResourceHeader.Description: The SAC-C repository contains a copy of the magnetic field data from the Compact Spherical Coil (CSC) Fluxgate Vector Magnetometer.

InformationURL.Name: The SAC-C Data set plus other similar data sets

AccessURL.Name: Virtual Magnetospheric Observatory
AccessURL.Description: Magnetic field data from the CSC onboard the SAC-C spacecraft.
